programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Retirees Steve and Jackie want a holiday home in Guardamar del Segura, southeast Spain, to enjoy with their family and friends. Lee Juggurnauth shows them what their budget of £80k can buy.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Peterborough and the first to host is chatty mum of three, Parveen Ashraf, whose Asian themed menu consists of a whopping two starters, five mains and two desserts. Shes going all out with a waitress and butler, plus entertainment in the form of `X Factor reject, Nicole Lawrence. However, healthcare assistant Aly Nicholson is far from impressed with the extra help - and is not afraid to speak her mind.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its day two in Peterborough and the turn of insurance broker and chilli hater, Shane Jackson to wow the group with his cooking skills. Last night he offended spice queen Parveen by leaving most of her food, but once hes in his own kitchen, he has one culinary disaster after another. After last nights alcohol free drinks, Carolle, Aly and Ricky are keen to enjoy some booze and get the party started.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its day three of the competition in Peterborough. Catering manager Carolle Barlow decides to host a 70s themed evening - and asks her guests to `Come as you were in 1977, a dress code which creates a problem for two of her guests, who werent even born until the 80s. However, theres more on the menu than the guests bargained for.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Peterborough its the turn of party girl Aly Nicholson to show off her culinary skills. Alys so confident she can win that shes even attempting two courses shes never cooked before. Shes determined to create a harmonious dinner party and bring the group together following the week of bickering between Shane and Parveen. However, over dinner Aly makes the mistake of starting a conversation about first impressions.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the final night of the competition in Peterborough and one of the five diners discovers whos won the £1,000 prize money. Pole dance instructor Ricky Dent, is feeling confident that his two-faced charm offensive through the week has buttered up the group and will reap its rewards. But Rickys night doesnt get off to the best of starts when his spicy starter burns the tongue of chilli-hater Shane. He manages to distract the group b.

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It: Brilliant Builds
programme.desc: A look back at one of Kirstie and Phils biggest builds, when one family went all in to overhaul their Huddersfield home beyond recognition. Paul and Dawns higgledy-piggledy layout didnt work for them anymore, so Kirstie got the sledgehammer out.

programme.desc: After NCIS find a secret government bank account that is funding a nationwide network of vigilante justice, the team must determine who is acting as judge and jury.

programme.desc: The team investigate the murder of a Marine Sergeant in the States who was hailed as a war hero for his efforts overseas. Also, Gibbs turns to Doctor Grace Confalone for advice.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Frank locks horns with a data-tracking company when it refuses to unlock a terrorists phone that may hold information regarding upcoming targets. Erin obtains information about an impending murder from a shady source.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: When a series of drive-by murders occurs after six wrongly convicted men are released from prison, Danny and Baez wonder if the murders were orchestrated by the men as an act of revenge. Meanwhile, Frank combats feelings of guilt.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU detectives pursue a high-tech kidnapper, while Detective Rollins is distracted by the sudden appearance of her troubled sister.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A baby kidnapped from a playground leads to a twisted case of lies, betrayal and infidelity. Hard-hitting and emotional series chronicling the life and crimes of the New York Police Department.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a rape victim is brought to the E.R. after a brutal and lengthy assault, Detective Benson recognizes the signature of a rapist on whom she believed the book had been closed eight years ago. The team must reopen the case to rule out whether there was a wrongful conviction back then, or they are dealing with a copycat now.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A rape and kidnapping is reported by the husband who watched it unfold via videochat while traveling home from a business trip. When the ransom demand is met, detectives intercept the wife when she arrives to get the money. Her debriefing, however, raises Bensons suspicions and a full investigation is launched.

programme.title: NCIS: Hawaii
programme.desc: The team investigates a shipwreck carrying exotic animals that now threaten the native wildlife on Oahu; Alex sustains a career-ending injury; Kai asks a fish and wildlife agent out on a date.

programme.title: The Lost Libraries of Timbuktu
programme.desc: Aminatta Forna tells the story of legendary Timbuktu and its long hidden legacy of hundreds of thousands of ancient manuscripts. With its university founded around the same time as Oxford, Timbuktu is proof that the reading and writing of books have long been as important to Africans as to Europeans.

programme.title: This Is BBC Four
programme.desc: BBC FOUR is the BBC channel for people who want more. More depth, more range, more to stimulate the mind.

programme.title: Christmas University Challenge
programme.sub-title: Exeter College, Oxford v Queen Mary University of London
programme.desc: Exeter College, Oxford and Queen Mary University, London are represented by distinguished alumni in the fourth heat. Newsreader Reeta Chakrabarti and environmental writer Lucy Siegle are hoping to lead their respective teams to a place in the semi-finals. Jeremy Paxman asks the questions.

programme.title: Judi Dench: My Passion for Trees
programme.desc: Dame Judi Dench journeys through the seasons on a mission to understand the vital role of trees in our history and our future, joined by some of the best tree scientists and historians to unlock the remarkable secret lives of trees and the stories that they cannot tell. Through the cycle of the four seasons, shell discover how they feel, learn how they communicate and discover how they fight off invading armies and extreme weather.

programme.title: UK Championship Snooker LIVE

programme.title: Quartet

programme.title: Wogan

programme.desc: Terry Wogan chats to Pauline Collins, Simon Callow, Esther Rantzen and Desmond Wilcox.

programme.title: Capability Browns Unfinished Garden
programme.desc: Bunny Guinness travels across England visiting Capability Browns most famous landscape gardens for inspiration as she attempts to recreate his work on the only land he ever owned in Fenstanton, Cambridgeshire.

programme.title: Britains Most Fragile Treasure
programme.desc: Historian Dr Janina Ramirez unlocks the secrets of a centuries-old masterpiece in glass, the East Window at York Minster - the largest medieval stained-glass window in the country and the creative vision of a master craftsman called John Thornton. Within its 311 panels is the entire history of the world.

programme.title: Rip-Off Britain
programme.desc: Julia Somerville, Gloria Hunniford and Louise Minchin reveal how criminals are using artificial intelligence to create deepfake videos of AI celebrities and public figures to try to get their hands on your cash. Also, the fraudsters pretending to be one of the worlds biggest software companies in order to steal money. And a man from Lancashire says his savings account was raided after fraudsters obtained his one-time security passcode.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: A three bedroom semi in the West Midlands has Dion worried. Significant cracks are all over the house, a clear sign of subsidence. Martel thinks a mid-terrace in Durham is a great space to create a family home. Martin is in Rolling Stones country in Dartford in Kent, trying to solve a heating mystery in a one-bedroom flat.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Roo Irvine is at the Antiques, Vintage and Collectors Fair in Detling, Kent. Detling. Experts Irita Marriott and Nick Hall help the red and blue teams as they shop for antiques to take to auction.

programme.title: The Marvellous Miniature Workshop
programme.desc: Sara Cox meets Julia, a jazz singer with powerful memories of Readings Central Club - a place of music, domino tournaments and Caribbean pride, where her father was a local legend. With the building now abandoned, Ethan faces the challenge of reviving its spirit in miniature. Can he bring back the stage, the iconic mural and the heartbeat of a vanished community?

programme.title: Make It at Market
programme.desc: Clay jewellery artist Rachel from Birmingham and coppersmith and sculptor Roy from Wiltshire are both hoping that their passions can become profitable businesses.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: A couple from Kent want to head west to Cornwall to house-hunt for a property where they can create a wellness retreat, and Jules Hudson is just the man to help them find it. Taking a break from the search, Jules hopes to catch a glimpse of a recently released family of beavers.

programme.title: The Bidding Room
programme.desc: Nigel Havers welcomes sellers of collectibles and curiosities to the Bidding Rooms home in Edinburgh, where they ply their wares to five dealers. First through the doors is chef Laura with a 1950s etagère, a tiered table for display. Next in is Richard with a pendant light he found at a flea market and haggled hard for to buy at a good price. Arriving at Edinburgh HQ next is retired calligrapher Davina. She was gifted some silver napkin holders found in a charity shop in Canada by a friend.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.desc: Raj and Bee hunt antiques in Kent. Toys, transport and a brave bear all feature. Will Bees bold buy gallop to victory, or will Rajs sweet and sentimental picks leave her trailing behind?

programme.desc: After the success of his comeback fight, Tommys road to redemption hits a major setback - his hand is injured again and needs eight weeks total rest before doctors will know if he can fight again. The last time he couldnt train, his life spiralled out of control, so now Tommy throws himself into a frenzy of activity: a TV appearance on The Wheel, family days out with Bambi, and a final push to finish the home he hopes Molly and Bambi will soon return to.

programme.desc: Can Sixteen to Twenty use their special skills to sneak past the robot guards at the Museum of Numbers? Learn about the special properties of numbers with the Numberblocks.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: In a most mysterious dream, Alphablock M discovers the different sounds that OO can make.

programme.title: Wonderblocks
programme.desc: The Wonderblocks help The Three Bears get ready for some rainy day fun!

programme.title: Small Potatoes
programme.desc: The potatoes celebrate the four seasons and sing a folksy song about the exciting things that come with each one.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels are hungry, but theyre not sure what to eat to fill their tummies, so they turn to Duggee for help. Fortunately, he has a cookbook where they can pick out something theyd like.

programme.title: Yukee
programme.desc: Stripes has big ideas about how to transform the Sunhouse into a bigger, more popular music venue. When his plans dont go down well with the rest of the garden gang, Stripes must learn that their garden and stage are perfect just as they are.

programme.title: Something Special
programme.desc: Justin and his friends host a summer party and pick vegetables to make a delicious salad. Mr Tumbles also hosting a party, but he struggles to find a garden game that hes good at.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies go on a day trip to the Hidey Hup. They take turns on the Tubby Bouncy, the Tubby Slidey and the Tubby Spinny, before they go on the Tubby Uppy Downy together.

programme.title: Andys Aquatic Adventures
programme.desc: Andy jets off to the flooded forests of North America in search of wood duck chicks.

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: Waffle feels left out of the Brooklyn-Bells fun, so he sets off to find his doggy family. Later, Mrs Hobbs meets Pepper.

programme.title: Molly and Mack
programme.desc: When Magnus finds it hard to stop talking at the Kids Club, James suggests that he starts his very own radio show at the Big Hub. With Mack as his trusty producer, DJ Magnus hits the airwaves. However, Magnuss chattiness soon gets him into a bit of bother. He promises everyone a free apple from Bobs stall, but he hasnt asked Bob if thats OK. And its not. DJ Magnus realises that hes been talking too much and decides to hang up his headphones.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa is busy racing round the jungle in his emergency cubby buggy coming to the rescue for every bump and scrape. He has so much fun, but do all his friends really need medical treatment?

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: The Game Catchers arrive on the Bright Planet where they meet the glowworms, aliens that look like glowworms, who need other players to play a game called Sardines.

programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Old Browns New Roost
programme.desc: When Old Brown quits Owl Island in search of some peace and quiet, his new roost turns out to be a little too close to home for Peter, Lily and Benjamin!

programme.title: Vida the Vet

programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. programme.desc: James Braxton and Raj Bisram continue an antiques hunt in the beautiful New Forest. Their French classic car is pointed to an auction in Shrewsbury, and an encounter with some of the areas famous ponies starts their day.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Optical instrument specialist Richard repairs a treasured telescope. Steve and Mark consider a broken but impressive radio.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: An art conservator restores a treasured painting. Organ restorer David restores an organ cherished by a small community.

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: Junk rejuvenator Jacqui Joseph is in Surrey rummaging through the rubbish at the Earlswood. Lighting designer Duncan McKean is then challenged to transform an antique floor lamp, while designer Chloe Kempster overhauls a vintage table and chest.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell present the stories of two women who uncovered life-changing news as adults that led them on a hunt for long-lost siblings. Whilst searching for her birth mother, Sian Jones discovered she has a sister out there somewhere and Long Lost Family help her search for both mother and sister. Meanwhile, Teleena Faux always believed she was the youngest of six siblings until she found evidence of a younger brother. Teleena has been desperate to find him ever since.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: A recently retired woman wants to declutter her home and raise money to visit her family abroad. Angus travels to Horsforth to dig through her collection, in order to see what hidden gems she may have.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It is the second leg of this jaunt with debutant Paul Martin and his seasoned tripper chum Raj Bisram. Paul is a dealer and certainly knows his way around an antiques shop. Raj, meanwhile, is an auctioneer with a competitive streak and is not giving any dispensation to his new pal, a Road Trip rookie. Our pair are sharing the driving duties as they head west in their open-topped roadster. Todays treasure tour also includes a stop-off in the New Forest to learn about wartime despatch riders.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: The third outing with Raj Bisram and Paul Martin. Given that it is dealer Pauls very first Road Trip experience, it is a good thing he has his chum Raj alongside him in the classic roadster. Just how chummy they will be when the auction rolls around remains to be seen. The pair explore the Cotswolds and the Mendips in style. Along the way, they discover the story of the fascinating Yorkshireman who not only discovered oxygen, but also had a big hand in the invention of the gin and tonic.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Angus and the team are in Harrogate to look through an impressive Art Deco collection. Later, they hunt for hidden gems at a cottage in Shropshire hoping to create some space for the owner of the cottage.

programme.title: Spooked Scotland
programme.desc: Charlie and the team uncover aggressive paranormal activity at one of the most haunted places in Scotland: Stirling Old Town Jail.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures
programme.desc: Zak Bagans and his crew investigate the most haunted places in the world. During the dusk-to-dawn lockdown, key evidence is documented to uncover the truth behind paranormal activity.

programme.title: Jack Osbournes Buried Bloodlines
programme.desc: Jack Osbournes search for his ancestors takes a chilling turn and leads him to eerie Willow Court Asylum; Jack and his team take on sinister forces and dark entities as their final challenge whilst trying to communicate with Jacks ancestors.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: Balgonie Castle in Scotland has seen brutal murders, violent battles and torture. With reported sightings of ghostly children and a mysterious Green Lady, there is much to uncover.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: In St Osyth the team visit a building so haunted that the owner cant bear to stay another night in it. Once used to hold suspected witches, this house carries a dark history.

programme.desc: Tony tries to find a peace with the Leotardo crew while dealing with rumours that a member of his own crew may have flipped. Meanwhile, AJ makes a decision regarding his future, and Juniors slide into dementia continues.

programme.title: The Penguin
programme.desc: The transformation of Oswald Cobblepot from a disfigured nobody to a noted Gotham gangster.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Winter is here. The long-awaited seventh season of the worlds most talked about show begins.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Roland Deschain, the last Gunslinger, must prevent the Man in Black from toppling the Dark Tower, the key that holds the universe together.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: To the court of the King of Qin, who seeks to rule the united country, comes Nameless, who claims to have killed three deadly assassins who were all determined to kill the King. As Nameless recounts his exploits in flashback, each time the wily King responds with his version. Is Nameless a true servant of Qin or does he have a secret agenda?

programme.title: Street Fighter
programme.desc: The cynical commander of Allied Nations forces has to prevent a warlord from taking over the world. With 63 hostages held in his seemingly impregnable fortress, the warlord is demanding an outrageously hefty ransom.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: After the triumph of the machines on Judgement Day and with killer robots hunting down the last vestiges of humanity, resistance fighter John Connor battles back. However, the arrival of a mysterious stranger threatens to tip the balance in favour of the machines.

programme.title: Twisters
programme.desc: Competing teams of storm chasers find themselves in a fight for their lives as multiple systems converge over central Oklahoma.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Roland Deschain, the last Gunslinger, must prevent the Man in Black from toppling the Dark Tower, the key that holds the universe together.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: A mild mannered, socially weird government accountant moonlights as a highly trained, and deadly assassin.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Professor Henry Jones is given a coded message during the Cold War which leads him to Peru in search of a legendary skull. Jones needs to deliver the skull to its rightful place, but Soviet agents who are trailing Jones have other plans which will endanger the West if the artefact falls into their hands.

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: One day, Fox and Hare discover that Owl has disappeared. They go looking for him in the forest with all their friends and discover a big lake that wasnt there before. It is the beginning of an exciting and funny adventure.

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Two rogues stumble across a map of the treasures of El Dorado and stow away on an explorers ship bound for South America, where they are mistaken for gods due to their foreign complexions. Narrated by Elton John, who provided the music to Tim Rices lyrics.

programme.title: Straight Outta Nowhere: Scooby-Doo Meets Courage the Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo and the Gang find themselves in the middle of Nowhere, Kansas, the backwoods hometown of Courage and his owners, Muriel and Eustace Bagge.

programme.title: The LEGO Movie 2: The Second Part
programme.desc: The citizens of Bricksburg face a dangerous new threat when LEGO DUPLO invaders from outer space start to wreck everything in their path. The battle to defeat the enemy and restore harmony to the LEGO universe takes Emmet, Lucy, Batman and the rest of their friends to faraway, unexplored worlds that test their courage and creativity.

programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: Just as Gru settles into his new role as a suburban family man, the ultrasecret Anti-Villain League sends him on a mission to nab the perpetrator of a spectacular heist.

programme.title: The Pirates! In an Adventure With Scientists
programme.desc: An inept swashbuckler decides to make an attempt to win the Pirate of the Year Award, and beat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz in a race to plunder the most booty. His journey takes him to Victorian London where the Pirate Captain must choose between winning Pirate of the Year, or helping his crew.

programme.title: Monsters vs Aliens
programme.desc: When an evil alien attacks the Earth, a motley crew of monsters is called into action to save the world from imminent destruction. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Transformers One
programme.desc: Brothers-in-arms Orion Pax and D-16 become sworn enemies Optimus Prime and Megatron.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, a robot named Roz must learn to adapt to its new surroundings. Building relationships with the native animals, Roz soon develops a parental bond with an orphaned gosling.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Ogre Shrek and his new wife Fiona are surprised to discover a letter from her parents, inviting them over for dinner. Fiona is eager to show off her new husband, but her parents dont yet know shes an ogre. Taking Donkey along, they set off for Far Far Away to visit them, but the trip is hampered by the jealousy of a wicked fairy godmother and her hired assassin, Puss in Boots.

programme.desc: Briar and Bramble lose their mother at a very young age under mysterious circumstances. Many years later, logger Vick takes the bears to visit the Robot Research Institute, and they uncover a clue relating to their mother.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owners kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A workaholic father finds that there are not enough hours in the day to balance his job and home life, until he discovers a remote control that can pause and rewind time. However, when it malfunctions, chaos ensues, and the man realises that he has lost control of his life.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In an update of the 1966 Lewis Gilbert version, the eponymous Alfie is transposed to Manhattan and working as a chauffeur. His conquests include older woman Liz, lonely Nikki and Lonette, his best friends girl. However, he begins to learn bitter truths about himself and the way he treats women and, by the end of the film, he discovers a degree of humility.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A fast-talking cop trails his best friends killer from the alleys of Detroit to the posh galleries of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss; she cant remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective, and Henry must convince them that hes in it for love.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: Tale about an unconventional sleuths attempts to find a football teams stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his mad companions leap onto the big screen. Expect the usual mad gross-out japes, from making snow cones out of urine to using the display toilets in bathroom outlets, and from racing golf carts over hallowed greens to tightrope walking over alligators.

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the gang unleash their most insane stunts yet, from roller-skating with a buffalo herd, to playing tennis with a beehive.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: When a DJs sardonic exhortation to a late-night caller to wipe out a bar full of yuppies is taken literally, his world falls apart. Years later, on the point of suicide, he is saved by a similar casualty, a former medievalist whose wife was a victim of the bar bloodbath, and offered a chance for redemption by the mans quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: Learning that he has AIDS, Ron Woodroof smuggles medicine into the United States to fight the disease.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: A conflicted Navy pilot and veteran of the Second World War questions the role he is forced to play when he is called back into service for the Korean War.

programme.title: The Bedford Incident
programme.desc: Thriller about a photojournalist on board a destroyer, the Bedford, commanded by Captain Finlander. When the ship discovers a Soviet sub in Greenlands territorial waters, the Captain begins a relentless pursuit that pushes his crew to breaking point.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: The Kings Speech
programme.desc: Afflicted with a stammer, Prince Albert, the Duke of York, dreads the speaking engagements that come with being the son of King George V.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: With the German Army now just across the Channel, newly-appointed Prime Minister Winston Churchill must decide between negotiating a peace treaty with Hitler or standing firm. With the King, the public and his own political party all questioning his wisdom, the hard-drinking Churchill has to survive his own darkest hour and rally the country behind him.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Paper Moon
programme.desc: A Depression-era con man becomes the unwilling temporary guardian of a precocious nine-year-old orphan.

programme.title: Paper Moon
programme.desc: A Depression-era con man becomes the unwilling temporary guardian of a precocious nine-year-old orphan.

Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Paper Moon
programme.desc: A Depression-era con man becomes the unwilling temporary guardian of a precocious nine-year-old orphan.

programme.title: Paper Moon
programme.desc: A Depression-era con man becomes the unwilling temporary guardian of a precocious nine-year-old orphan.

programme.title: Blueback
programme.desc: After Dora suffers a stroke, her adult daughter, Abby returns to her coastal Australian hometown to help with her recovery. To try to coax Dora out of her nonverbal state, Abby tells her stories from her childhood, recalling Doras activism.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: When a foster child meets the daughter of a bazillionaire, they hatch a plan to solve the problems in their life, and switch identities.

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
programme.desc: SpongeBob goes on a quest to discover a stolen recipe that takes him to our world, where he tangles with a pirate.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit and his three sisters -- Flopsy, Mopsy and Cotton-Tail -- enjoy spending their days in Mr. McGregors vegetable garden. When one of McGregors relatives suddenly moves in, hes less than thrilled to discover a family of rabbits in his new home. A battle of wills soon breaks out as the new owner hatches scheme after scheme to get rid of Peter -- a resourceful rabbit who proves to be a worthy and wily opponent.

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Alan Parrish disappeared as a young boy. Nobody believes his friends story that he was sucked into the game they were playing. Twenty-six years later, two children find the game in their attic, and when they start to play, Alan is released, but the game isnt over yet, and Alan must finish before he is really free.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Family adventure about two squabbling siblings who find a mysterious old board game in their basement. The bickering brothers discover the game has magical powers when a chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas bitter big brother has to find his Christmas spirit before the season is ruined for the whole world.

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: In this version of the classic story - based on the smash Broadway musical - Dorothy is a shy 24-year-old Harlem kindergarten teacher who is brought by a snowstorm to the mysterious Land of Oz, a sprawling, decaying, nightmarish, and dangerous megalopolis that resembles the physical characteristics of New York City.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: A.I.: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Futuristic version of the fairy tale `Pinocchio, about a highly advanced robotic child who longs to become a real boy so he can win back the love of his adoptive mother who abandoned him. He journeys through a violent, dystopian world in a quest for the Blue Fairy who has the power to make his dream come true.

programme.title: The Portable Door
programme.desc: A man lands an internship at a mysterious London firm with unconventional employees, including the charismatic CEO who is incorporating modern corporate strategy into ancient magical practices.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Weather scientists Jo and Bill put marital problems aside to track a slew of devastating tornadoes raging through Oklahoma and stay one step ahead of their better-equipped but arrogant rivals. They have to get to the tornado first to be able to test a radical new device, by inserting it directly into the heart of the storm.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers encounter the mighty Kong and other monstrous creatures after travelling to an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Effects-laden blockbuster about a huge reptile which emerges from the sea to wreak havoc in Manhattan. On a research trip to Chernobyl, a young scientist discovers a startling link between genetic mutation and radioactivity. When a fishing trawler is attacked by an unseen creature, and other evidence of a massive reptilian creature is unearthed, he realises that the creature is following a destructive path to New York.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Weather scientists Jo and Bill put marital problems aside to track a slew of devastating tornadoes raging through Oklahoma and stay one step ahead of their better-equipped but arrogant rivals. They have to get to the tornado first to be able to test a radical new device, by inserting it directly into the heart of the storm.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Germany advances into France, trapping Allied troops on the beaches of Dunkirk. Under air and ground cover from British and French forces, troops are slowly and methodically evacuated from the beach using every vessel that can be found.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, finds himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Rod Tidwell. Maguires personal life starts to fall apart as hes torn between love and money in Cameron Crowes metaphor on Americans need for success and money.

programme.title: The Line
programme.desc: A university student lives life without fear of consequences.

programme.title: The Wasp
programme.desc: Based on the play by Morgan Lloyd Malcolm.

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: The notorious Kowloon Walled City serves as a fortified, lawless safe haven for gangs and refugees alike. But when a skilled underground fighter runs afoul of the most feared Triad boss in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: Snatched from the Green Place of Many Mothers, young Furiosa gets caught in the crossfire of two tyrannical warlords. As the tyrants fight for dominance, Furiosa soon finds herself in a nonstop battle to make her way home.

programme.title: Black Bag
programme.desc: When his beloved wife, Kathryn, is suspected of betraying the nation, intelligence agent George Woodhouse faces the ultimate test -- loyalty to his marriage or his country.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Kravens complex relationship with his ruthless father starts him down a path of vengeance, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Lured from Victorian England to the wilds of the Congo, Tarzan must return to the jungle to save his captive wife from King Leopolds devious envoy.

programme.title: Retribution
programme.desc: While driving with his two kids, a man receives a phone call from an unknown assailant who claims there is a bomb in the car. Unable to exit the vehicle, he must now follow a series of twisted instructions while trying to figure out how to survive.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: Iris finds her comfortable New York City life thrown into disarray after her closest friend and mentor bequeaths her a Great Dane named Apollo. Yet as Iris finds herself unexpectedly bonding with Apollo, she begins to come to terms with her past.

programme.title: Drop
programme.desc: Violet is a widowed mother who goes to a restaurant to meet Henry, her charming and handsome date. However, she soon receives phone messages from a mysterious, hooded figure who threatens to kill her young son and sister unless she kills Henry.

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: The Herdmans are six siblings who have a reputation for being the worst kids in the world. However, when they take over the local church pageant during the holidays, they just might teach a shocked community the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: Until Dawn
programme.desc: Exploring an abandoned visitor centre, Clover and her friends encounter a masked killer who murders them one by one. However, when they mysteriously wake up at the beginning of the same night, theyre forced to relive the terror over and over again.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: When a familys pet cat is called, they manage to resurrect the animal by placing it in an Indian burial ground which, it is believed, can revive the dead, although in doing so they create a monster.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Friendships Death
programme.desc: A British reporter meets female robot Friendship, who has been sent from another planet to war-torn 1970 Jordan.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A leaving party for New Yorker Rob Hawkins is rudely interrupted by the arrival of an unwelcome guest, something that has a penchant for smashing up skyscrapers, playing football with the Statue of Libertys head and handpicking humans as snacks.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman discovers the horrifying truth about the outside world while living in an underground shelter with two men.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Constantine
programme.desc: Supernatural tale based on the cult comic book `Hellblazer. Chain-smoking loner Constantine tries to buy his place in heaven by banishing earth-bound demons back to hell, but his fate is tied up with Angela, a policewoman investigating the alleged suicide of her twin.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas bitter big brother has to find his Christmas spirit before the season is ruined for the whole world.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Almost Christmas
programme.desc: All a retired widower wants for Christmas is for his family to get along. If they can honour his wish and spend five whole, happy days together, it may just be a Christmas miracle.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: The Herdmans are six siblings who have a reputation for being the worst kids in the world. However, when they take over the local church pageant during the holidays, they just might teach a shocked community the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A young boy who doesnt believe in Santa Claus is shocked to see a train stop outside his window on Christmas Eve destined for the North Pole. When he accepts an invitation from the conductor to climb on board, he embarks on a white-knuckle ride to Santas headquarters where he learns an invaluable lesson about the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: Its a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: George Bailey has so many problems he is thinking about ending it all - and its Christmas! As the angels discuss George, we see his life in flashback. As George is about to jump from a bridge, he ends up rescuing his guardian angel, Clarence - who then shows George what his town would have looked like if it hadnt been for all his good deeds over the years.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: Three ghosts give a greedy network executive a long-overdue attitude adjustment over the Christmas period. Based on the Charles Dickens classic, `A Christmas Carol.

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A placid small town is brought to its knees by an infestation of destructive small creatures with a vicious sense of humour.

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: When the CEO tries to close her hard-partying brothers branch, he and his chief technical officer must inspire their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and save their jobs.

programme.title: The 12 Days of Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Santa gives a successful businessman 12 chances to relive the same day so he can repair his damaged relationships with his loved ones.

programme.title: Unhinged
programme.desc: A mother leans on her horn at the wrong time, to the wrong guy. Road rage doesnt begin to describe what hes about to do to her and everyone she knows.

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor
programme.desc: A bookish library clerk working for a CIA front is hunted after he stumbles across a covert intelligence operation. Returning from lunch, he finds the entire office massacred. Using his codename Condor, he contacts the CIA, but when an agent tries to kill him, he kidnaps a stranger off the street to ensure his survival and attempts to turn the tables on those who want him dead.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Last Stop in Yuma County
programme.desc: Stranded at an Arizona rest stop, a travelling knife salesman gets thrust into a high-stakes hostage situation by the arrival of two bank robbers who will stop at nothing to protect their ill-begotten fortune.

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer wants to retire with his millions and his health intact, but mob boss Price has other ideas, dragging him into a set-up involving a missing junkie, a million stolen tablets of `E and an East European hitman.

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: An international hit man and quick-change artist is hired by a secret organisation to assassinate Charles de Gaulle.

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Another great white shark arrives to terrorise the holiday resort of Amity Island. Having recovered from the grisly events of four years ago, the island is once again packed with tourists. Families are sailing in the bay and swimming off the beach, but when two divers and a water-skier go missing, the local police chief fears that he is about to relive his greatest nightmare.

programme.title: Jaws III
programme.desc: Second sequel to Steven Spielbergs 1970s blockbuster transports the action from Amity Island to a new undersea kingdom attraction in a Florida theme park. The capture of a baby great white shark is big news and brings crowds to the park - until its mother arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: An ex-cons plan to pose as his late cellmate backfires when he is roped into a casino heist on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Oceans Twelve
programme.desc: Casino mobster Benedict knows who stole his money and he wants it back. Danny and his crew of thieves have just two weeks to steal $190m, or their lives will be forfeit, but who is the mystery thief competing for the loot? This time Benedicts ex-girlfriend is on their side, even an integral part of the plan.

programme.title: Oceans Thirteen
programme.desc: The remaining members of Danny Oceans gang regroup to jeopardise the nefarious plans of a businessman who double-crossed one of Dannys old friends. The team plan to ruin the opening of his glitzy Las Vegas casino and hotel by rigging the games and ensuring that every punter goes home with a jackpot.

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Eleven years after their horrific experiences at reform school, Tommy Marcano and John Reilly have become two-bit American gangsters, Lorenzo Carcaterra is a reporter and Michael Sullivan an assistant DA. The four are reunited when they chance across one of the abusive guards and take the chance for revenge.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in Americas former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: The outwardly charming and intelligent psychopath Dr Lecter is in Florence, masquerading as a museum curator. A greedy cop discovers his true identity, and plans to hand him over to someone willing to pay, but things do not go to plan when female FBI agent Clarice Starling gets a call to help Lecters only living victim - the hideously deformed Mason Verger.

programme.desc: Two months after the murder, Chuck commits suicide as revelations emerge from his brother, troubling errors in the police investigation come to light, and the Black community responds in anger.

programme.title: House of Kardashian
programme.desc: Kylie Jenner keeps the family relevant and becomes a Generation Z icon, but pressure mounts on the Kardashian dynasty to be socially responsible.

programme.title: History of the Sitcom
programme.desc: Moms, dads, husbands, wives, brothers, sisters -- more than just a hilarious reflection of people to grow up and old with, sitcoms have opened the hearts of many to a more inclusive vision of what family can mean.

programme.title: History of the Sitcom
programme.desc: Work families can be even funnier than biological ones, since the endless array of wacky sitcom characters on the job offers hilarious insights into the state of the American workplace.

programme.title: I Am Raquel Welch
programme.desc: Celebrating the life of a trailblazing actress and single mother who not only redefined the worlds idea of a Hollywood sex symbol, but also led the way for modern-day action heroines.

programme.sub-title: Chapter Four: Nothing Takes the Place of You

programme.title: David Frost vs...
programme.desc: Charting almost half a century of social, political, and cultural change through the eyes of Sir David Frost. Built on over 50 years worth of rare or never-before-seen archive, revealing a unique view of transatlantic history from 1960 to 2000.

programme.title: The Truth vs. Alex Jones
programme.desc: Focuses on the aftermath of the 2012 Sandy Hook Elementary School shootings and the defamation lawsuit against conspiracy theorist Alex Jones.

programme.title: Celtics City
programme.desc: As the Celtics and Lakers battle for basketball supremacy, Larry Bird and Magic Johnsons rivalry captivates the sports world; in 1986, Bird helps lead one of the most dominant seasons in NBA history, but an unthinkable tragedy changes everything.

programme.title: Celtics City
programme.desc: The tragic death of Len Bias casts a shadow over the Celtics, and Larry Birds style of play begins to take its toll; new rivals emerge with the Celtics going head-to-head with the Detroit Pistons in a heated 1987 playoff series; Bird retires.

programme.title: The Zen Diaries of Garry Shandling
programme.desc: Garry Shandlings unlikely path toward success begins following an impulsive move to Los Angeles. A serious traffic accident results in a near-death experience. The success of the sitcom "Its Garry Shandlings Show" elevates the comics profile.

programme.title: The Zen Diaries of Garry Shandling
programme.desc: Despite the success of "The Larry Sanders Show," the comic struggles with complacency. Shandling works through unexpected emotional, physical and professional crises, finding solace in community and a mentorship of younger comics.

programme.title: The Zen Diaries of Garry Shandling

programme.title: 1972: Munichs Black September

programme.title: The Directors

programme.title: The Seventies

programme.title: Discovering Film

programme.title: The Directors

programme.desc: Two months after the murder, Chuck commits suicide as revelations emerge from his brother, troubling errors in the police investigation come to light, and the Black community responds in anger.

programme.title: House of Kardashian
programme.desc: Kylie Jenner keeps the family relevant and becomes a Generation Z icon, but pressure mounts on the Kardashian dynasty to be socially responsible.

programme.title: History of the Sitcom
programme.desc: Moms, dads, husbands, wives, brothers, sisters -- more than just a hilarious reflection of people to grow up and old with, sitcoms have opened the hearts of many to a more inclusive vision of what family can mean.

programme.title: History of the Sitcom
programme.desc: Work families can be even funnier than biological ones, since the endless array of wacky sitcom characters on the job offers hilarious insights into the state of the American workplace.

programme.title: I Am Raquel Welch
programme.desc: Celebrating the life of a trailblazing actress and single mother who not only redefined the worlds idea of a Hollywood sex symbol, but also led the way for modern-day action heroines.

programme.title: The Truth vs. Alex Jones

programme.desc: Built by William the Conqueror, the Tower of London is one of Britains most iconic landmarks. Dan Jones reveals some of its fascinating secrets and tells the stories of the traitors, rebels and royalty who met their end inside its imposing walls.

programme.desc: The alternate universe double of Kiras dead lover appears on the station seeking asylum.

programme.title: Highway Cops
programme.desc: A dash cam catches a terrifying car flip. And after failing two breath tests, a drunk driver still thinks he is fine to drive.

programme.title: Teleshopping

programme.title: Teleshopping

programme.title: Motorway Patrol
programme.desc: Police contend with a hit and run, and a speeding driver who has no idea what theyre doing. Also another baffled driver is confused by the spark under their chassis.

programme.title: Motorway Patrol

programme.title: Border Patrol
programme.desc: A troublesome taxi drivers keeps Customs and the police busy, while some solar lights arrive supercharged with drugs.

programme.title: Border Patrol
programme.desc: Biosecurity New Zealand finds a hidden haul. Plus, Customs finds a picture worth a thousand words - and tens of thousands of dollars.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: When the people of Atlantis begin to have ghostly visions, Teyla believes the apparitions they are seeing are actually Ancients, warning them of a great danger. Meanwhile, McKay finds the whale he believes saved him from a submerged puddle jumper over a year ago. The Doctor quickly realises that the whale is just one of many heading straight for Atlantis. Could they be heading to destroy the city?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: SG-1 learns of a new prior spreading the word of the Ori in a more humane way than ever before and decides to investigate. When the new prior turns out to be Daniel Jackson the team elects to save him, even though its very likely a trap by Adria. Whether or not they aid him with his potentially catastrophic plan becomes moot when the IOA decides Jackson poses too great a risk and must be killed.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager
programme.desc: The Hirogen hunters take over Voyager and play a deadly game with the crew in a simulation of World War II.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: A traumatised boy rescued from a wrecked ship is drawn to Data, and Picard attempts to discover the cause of the vessels destruction.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine
programme.desc: A group of genetically engineered, antisocial savants under Bashirs care predict the Federation will lose the war.

programme.title: What The Killer Did Next
programme.desc: A murder begins a tawdry tale of stolen money, an international escape attempt and an email from the supposed killer keen to sell his story.

programme.title: What The Killer Did Next

programme.desc: When a womans body is found in a bin in Lewes, police look for the perpetrator of a disturbing crime.

programme.title: Wynonna Earp

programme.title: Brit Cops: Frontline Crime UK
programme.desc: Police in West Wales respond to a huge fight outside a nightclub and target the house of a suspected drug dealer.

programme.title: Deadly Australians
programme.desc: Behind the facade of Australias dramatic scenery is a motley crew of silent assassins, con artists, gang members and brutal brawlers, vying for supremacy amidst the harsh, dry and desolate Australian desert.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia
programme.desc: Some rarer and smaller marsupials highlight the fascinating contrasts within the overall marsupial group. Few showcase these innate differences better than quokkas and the quolls.

programme.title: Big Beasts: Last of the Giants
programme.desc: Beginning in the Americas, Patrick finds out more about the sperm whale, the planets largest predator, comes face to face with grizzlies and gets up close and personal with the anaconda and reveals how these giants are shaping their environments.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: There is a scuffle between the female capuchins, Tia needs surgery, and orang-utan Amy is heavily pregnant - and very grumpy. Meanwhile, there is something new in the play area of the chimp nursery, and Alison has her last visit with Paulo, the baby woolly monkey she has successfully reared by hand.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Chimp Ben has a nasty infection and animal director Jeremy is worried it may lead to him losing his foot. Meanwhile, in Paddys chimp troop, it may be his dad who is the boss, but baby Bart is realising that he is pretty important too. Elsewhere, golden-cheeked gibbon Tien has undergone a transformation, and keeper Holly checks up on Xuzy.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia
programme.sub-title: Secret Life of Bugs and Butterflies
programme.desc: At first glance, the tropical forests of Australia seem empty and still. But look closer and they are packed with life. Few places in the country contain such a high diversity of insects.

programme.title: Big Beasts: Last of the Giants
programme.desc: Patrick Aryee gets eye to eye with Komodo dragons, orangutans and giant pandas as he explores why these creatures all came to be supersized.

programme.title: Wild Family Ties
programme.desc: From the moment they take their precious first steps as babies, little ones face a great many difficulties and dangers across the animal kingdom as they strive to survive to adulthood.

programme.title: Islands
programme.desc: Hyenas claim the largest island in the delta, but must defend it. Elephants and hippos sculpt the waterways and make new homes for smaller creatures.

programme.title: Wild Rockies
programme.desc: Survival in the forest means maintaining a delicate balance between growth and destruction and death and rebirth, a forest should be in a constant state of regeneration. When trees get too tall they block all the sunlight from hitting the ground, which means grasses and smaller shrubs cant grow, diminishing habitat for animals like elk, moose, caribou, and wolves.

programme.title: Monkey Life

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia
programme.desc: While many think of coastlines and deserts when they think of Australia, there are other secret pockets of paradise that are home to some of the most intriguing and iconic of its animals: the waterholes.

programme.title: Big Beasts: Last of the Giants

programme.desc: Chimp Bens mysterious infection has spread to some of the others in his group, and its a race against time to diagnose and treat it effectively. Meanwhile, the orang-utans are watching their weight, but are not so keen to get onto the scales. Plus, the lemurs and stump-tailed macaques meet for the first time - could they become housemates?

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Chimp Bens foot infection has led to the amputation of one of his toes. Just as hes improving, Honey, one of the chimps in Hananyas house, is struck down by the mysterious bacterial infection - and it is serious.

programme.title: Wild Rockies
programme.desc: For many species, the structures of group living are the most important for survival. Although social living is integral to many of the animals that call the Rocky Mountains home, no two species organize their society in the same way.

programme.title: Weird, Wild and Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colourful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Islands
programme.desc: New and Exclusive. Sri Lanka: Never-before-filmed highland leopards stalk Sambar deer, while territorial mudskippers and fiddler crabs compete for homes and mates. (6 of 6)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses...
programme.desc: Del knows that the world is his oyster, if only he can discover the whereabouts of Freddie the Frogs legacy of gold bullion. In the meantime, he has to keep the money coming in by flogging infra-red massagers to punters in the market, with Uncle Albert demonstrating their fantastic healing properties.

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: The wedding of Wesley and Edies daughter provides a happy diversion for Compo and Clegg. But when they meet Uncle Seymour, retired headmaster and would-be brilliant inventor, nothing seems to go quite as expected - especially when he takes charge of the groom on his stag night.

programme.title: Keeping Up Appearances
programme.desc: Hyacinth puts everything into directing and starring in a pageant based on the Civil War. She feels it is essential that people are aware of their local history, especially with the council tax going up again.

programme.title: Still Open All Hours
programme.desc: Its Christmas in the nations favourite corner shop and Granville has a large consignment of mistletoe mince pies to shift. Eric and Cyril refuse to be taken in by the wily grocers promises of romantic enhancement in every box.

programme.title: The Vicar of Dibley
programme.desc: Alice has worked out the clues in `The Da Vinci Code and concluded, somewhat worryingly, that she is the last living descendant of Jesus Christ. Meanwhile, the Vicar is fed up with rich townies buying weekend cottages in her beloved Dibley - until she meets one of them. Could Harry possibly be her Mr Right? Unlike every other villager hes not insane and has his own teeth.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Trans-Siberian Adventure
programme.desc: The last leg of her 6,400-mile train journey from Hong Kong to Moscow finds Joanna is in deepest Siberia. First stop is Lake Baikal, one of the deepest lakes in the world. She drinks vodka with a local fisherman before getting back on the train for Krasnoyarsk to meet an oligarch. From there she travels across the vast emptiness of Siberia to Yekaterinburg, a city with a dark history. The last tsar and his family were murdered here in 1918.

programme.title: My Kind of Town
programme.desc: Ian Hamilton and his guide dog, Major, are off to Blairgowrie and Rattray in Perthshire. He asks those who live in the town how they feel about the place and what its future might hold.

programme.title: My Kind of Town
programme.desc: Ian Hamilton and guide dog Major are off to Annan in Dumfries and Galloway. With its important industrial history, including boat building, fishing and even nuclear power, how is Annan adapting to the modern world?

programme.desc: Dereks search for the unusual lands him a 1947 Lea Francis thats half-made of wood. Paul heads for the countryside to pick up a Morris one tonne truck.

programme.desc: Dave and Jack head to East Yorkshire to pick up a dusty Alfa Romeo and a 1930s Jowett. But Daves more taken with a possible Christmas present - a Carry On-style, bum-wobbling exercise machine.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Examining an 18th-century Welsh dresser, a collection of early Valentine cards, an English marquetry clock and 16th-century watercolors from Aberystwyth, Wales.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team of experts travel to Northumberland for a visit to the recently re-opened Seaton Delaval Hall. programme.title: My Kind of Town
programme.desc: Ian Hamilton and guide dog, Major, head to Cumnock in East Ayrshire. Once a thriving mining town, Cumnock now has an ambition to become Scotlands first green town by running its own hi-tech renewable energy system.

programme.title: My Kind of Town
programme.desc: In this episode, Ian and Major head to Shotts in North Lanarkshire, a town thats feeling a bit unloved and down on its luck. Since the closing of its iron foundry, there has been very little solid employment.

programme.title: My Kind of Town
programme.desc: Ian and Major head to Angus and the town of Arbroath, a fine red sandstone town which nestles around its historic abbey. No longer with a fishing industry, the town relies on leisure boats visiting the beautiful little harbour.

programme.title: My Kind of Town
programme.desc: Ian and Major leave dry land and cross the Minch to Stornoway, capital of the Western Isles. With plans for a big new harbour to attract cruise ships and more business investment, Stornoway is looking to the future.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek picks up a lovingly restored 1925 Calthorpe motorbike that he thinks is more of a work of art than anything ever produced by Picasso.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Dave gets wind of a possible free lunch at the officers mess when he heads off to collect a stylish Swedish Volvo P1800S from an RAF base in the Midlands.

programme.title: War Factories
programme.sub-title: The Engine That Won the War
programme.desc: The Spitfire, Hurricane, Lancaster and Wellington bombers, aircraft that undoubtedly won the Battle of Britain, had one thing in common, they were powered by the Rolls-Royce Merlin engine.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: Looking at the end of the war, and at how the superpowers confronted each other to establish a new political order.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team visit Northern Ireland for a busy day of evaluations at Castle Coole near Enniskillen. Amongst the objects catching the experts eyes are a pair of tea caddies that raise suspicions, a valuable carriage clock with royal association, and a watch and two rings accepted as payment for an unpaid bar bill which provide a surprise ending.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team of experts return to Layer Marney Tower in Essex. Among the objects under scrutiny are the first aid box that accompanied Shackleton on his endurance expedition to the Antarctic in 1914, a suitcase of poems evoking life as a fighter pilot in World War II, and a small but valuable relic from the Titanic.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Derek encourages the team to buy a Francis Barnett Plover at auction. Plus, the wheels come off the restoration of an MG Metro.

programme.desc: Mittis world crumbles when her husband is accused of harassment. As she faces public shame, deeper secrets emerge, forcing her to question everything she thought she knew.

programme.title: Maana Ke Hum Yaar Nahi
programme.desc: Strong-willed Khushis world revolves around her father, and she enters a marriage contract with Krishna, a conman, in order to save him.

programme.title: Anupamaa
programme.desc: Anupamaa, a warmhearted homemaker, receives neglect and ridicule in return for lavishing her family with affection, but there comes a time when she finds the ones who truly appreciate her.

programme.title: Udne Ki Aasha
programme.desc: Fate poses a threat to Sailees fairytale hopes by tying her in a lifelong bond with Sachin, an uncouth and emotionally scarred taxi driver who shuns the idea of romance and marriage.

programme.title: Udne Ki Aasha
programme.desc: Fate poses a threat to Sailees fairytale hopes by tying her in a lifelong bond with Sachin, an uncouth and emotionally scarred taxi driver who shuns the idea of romance and marriage.

programme.title: Great Grand Masti
programme.desc: Three friends travel to a small town where they meet Ragini, a gorgeous woman. However, they soon realise that Ragini brings nothing but trouble in their lives.

programme.title: Awarapan
programme.desc: A hit-man falls in love with a devout Muslim woman who opens his eyes to compassion and the teachings of Pighamber Mohammad.

programme.desc: A man hopes that its not too late to win the woman of his dreams after his family resists their romance.

programme.title: Aao Pyar Karen
programme.desc: A romantic love triangle released in 1980, shot in the exotic locales of Kashmir, with songs composed by Rajesh Roshan.

programme.title: Ek Vivah Aisa Bhi
programme.desc: Bhopal-based statuesque singing beauty, Chandni Shrivastava, falls in love with wealthy fellow-singer, Prem Ajmera. However, this is no fairytale romance and problems soon arise.

programme.title: Rascals
programme.desc: The joys of conning, where two rival con-men attempt to outdo each other to woo a wealthy woman.

programme.title: Commando 3
programme.desc: The commando, Karanveer Singh Dogra, is approached to chase and catch an Indian criminal gang, who pose a threat to India itself.

programme.title: Ayaash Dil
programme.desc: His personal life takes a turn when he gets involved in a series of affairs despite being married.

programme.title: Hello Darling
programme.desc: Three harassed female employees fear they have killed their very-much-alive boss and try to dispose off the dead body of an unknown male.

programme.title: Bob Biswas
programme.desc: After eight years in a coma, an insurance agent returns home to his wife and son, but he has no memories of his past.
